function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);

var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,

);

Price: $11.99 - $9.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:02 UTC – Details)


Mancala is one of the world’s oldest and best-loved games, and Pressman’s folding wooden Mancala board offers an affordable way to play that makes a great travel game as well as a wonderful home edition. Players take turns scooping up the special stones and counting them out one at a time into the pockets on the board. When they drop a stone into an empty pocket on their side of the board, they capture all the stones in the opposite pocket. It sounds like a simple marble game, but it’s got plenty of strategy and reinforces STEM skills like counting and strategic planning. The winner is the player who collects the most stones! This folding Mancala includes a hinged wooden playing board, 48 plastic stones, and complete instructions.
Invented thousands of years ago, Mancala is one of the world’s favorite games of counting and strategy
Hinged wooden board folds for easy storage, making it a great choice for home and travel
Reinforces STEM and STEAM skills
Tested for safety and quality
For 2 players, ages 6 and up


Read more


Mancala Wooden Folding Set by Pressman, Ages 6 and Up, 2 Players

Mancala is one of the world’s oldest and best-loved games. Players take turns scooping up the special stones and counting them out one at a time into the pockets on the board. When they drop a stone into an empty pocket on their side of the board, they capture all the stones in the opposite pocket. The player who collects the most stones wins!




Easy to learn gameplay

This classic game with simple rules is loved by kids and adults alike! Players drop stones into pockets on the board as they try to capture the stones in their opponent’s pockets to win!

Reinforces STEM skills

Mancala sounds like a simple marble game, but it’s got plenty of strategy and reinforces STEM skills like counting and strategic planning.

Great for home and travel

The folding wooden board easily stores all pieces in a convenient compact size, making this a great choice for home or travel.

Read more

Mancala – Wooden Folding Set Mancala for Kids Mexican Train Dominoes Family Classics Chess Mastermind
Description In this game of strategy, players scoop up stones and count them out one at a time into the pockets on the board. Drop a stone into an empty pocket on your side to capture all the stones in the opposite pocket. Collect the most stones to win! Now kids can enjoy the classic game of Mancala in this special edition where the gemstones are replaced with cute plastic animals! With just a few easy rules to follow, the object is to collect the most animals by the end of the game to win. Introduce your family to a new way to play the old classic game of dominoes! Play all the dominoes from your hand onto one or more chains, or “trains,” leading from a central hub. Can’t play? Use the colorful trains to mark the end of your turn. This is the perfect chess set to add to your family game collection and is great for both beginners and experienced players. This set includes a folding chess board and full-size Staunton chess pieces, which features a 2.63″ King. It’s Codemaker vs. Codebreaker to find who will be the Mastermind! The Codemaker creates a secret code. The Codebreaker tries to match the code using logic, deduction and a little bit of luck. Can you crack the code in 10 moves or less?
Minimum Age 6+ 6+ 6+ 8+ 8+
Minimum Players 2 2 1 2 2
Maximum Players 2 2 8 2 2

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:02 UTC – Details)

My little girl’s ears are allergic. Can she wear this stud？

Yes, she can. The post is made of sterling silver, is hypoallergenic and won’t harm her ears.

Are these little girl stud earrings? Can adults wear it?

Of course you can, and it’s even better for you. In order to make it safe for little girls to use, so it’s safe. Simple design with love makes this stud suitable for most people.

I don’t like the backs in the picture. Is there any other choice?

Oh, of course, we will include three different pairs of additional backs in the package, so you can choose whichever pair you like.

I can’t find the letters I was looking for, why?

Our products contain all the letters and are available in three different colors, if some of the letters are not on the list, it is because it is out of stock, we will make up for it as soon as possible, you can come back to Anoup after a while.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $12.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:17:50 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Beautiful and Dainty Gold Butterfly Necklace. This Minimalist necklace features a small Butterfly pendant that is 14kt gold plated and is perfect to wear by itself or for your gold layering look.

Dainty Butterfly Pendant Initial Necklace

Butterflies have long been regarded as symbols of transformation throughout the world due to their own journey from caterpillar to decorative, vibrant butterfly. Whether you’ve recently gone through your own beautiful transformation or you’ve always just loved butterflies, this minimalist gold butterfly pendant necklace is a stylish addition to your wardrobe.

Cute BUTTERFLY INITIAL necklace for little girls, toddler, or baby. This adorable initial necklace makes the perfect personalized gift for any girl, any age! They will smile with excitement when they unbox their very own cute initial necklace!

Our factory uses top grade materials which ensure every piece of our jewelry is a quality one.Meanwhile,MONOOC Jewelry has the most strictly quality control.We are dfferent from other similar products on Amazon. You will no longer encounter any tarnishing or breakage problems at all, 100% no worry shopping with us!

Perfect gifts for her

For Daughter

High quality 14kt gold plated chain that will not tarnish or discolor with daily wear and will keep its shine for a lifetime.

For Lover

It’s simple, classic design will be popular and trendy for many years to come.

For Friends

This sweet butterfly pendant necklace is the perfect gift for anyone that is opening a new chapter in their life to become their own butterfly.

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 5, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ MONOOC
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B089PYMQ68

NECKLACE LENGTH: 16’’ with 2’’ extender, featuring a sturdy lobster clasp. The chain is dainty but strong, and will not break on you.
SUPERIOR QUALITY: Made of high quality 14K real gold plated brass material, non-fading, hypoallergenic, lead-free and nickel-free, does not cause any harm to the human body.
PERFECT GIFT: The dainty butterfly necklace packaged with a beautiful box, exquisite card. It’s a pretty gift for best friends, family, lover, children, sisters nieces or anyone on birthday, Christmas, graduation, wedding or mothers day etc.
After Service: 180 Days Money Back or Exchange Service. If you have any questions with the butterfly pendant necklace, please feel free to contact us, we will make sure to resolve all your concerns with 24 business hours.

These Mesh open ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $34.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:07:25 UTC – Details)


3 Pack: Men’s Active Athletic Basic Soft Mesh Open Bottom Sweatpants are comfortable, durable, and fashionable. These active athletic sweatpants are the perfect active open bottom sweatpants to wear to work out or lounge. A regular relax fit style will prevent bulkiness and provides a fashionable look. These Mesh open bottom sweatpants are the perfect Active pants for any activities such as running, jogging, tennis, skiing, snowboarding, skate boarding, football, soccer, and any outdoor related sports. Or these are the perfect loungewear pants to wear to class, run errands, or just around the house. Our Men’s athletic training sweatpants come in stylish colors, and styles while ensuring comfort and fashion. Our mesh active sweatpants have an adjustable drawstring to guarantee they stay in place throughout any workout activity delivery custom fit and feel. Count on our 3 Pack: Men’s Active Athletic Tech Mesh Open Bottom Sweatpants for total comfort, great quality, and amazing value for money. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now!
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 15.35 x 12.56 x 3.46 inches; 1.72 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 2, 2021
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09KX98113

Imported
Drawstring closure
Machine Wash
A relaxed straight leg and elastic, drawstring waistband bring lounge-ready style to these athletic sweatpants. Two deep side pockets.
Mesh athletic open bottom sweatpants perfect for both lounge and outdoor athletic activities,jogging, running, exercise, athletic, track, fitness or workout
Tech mesh wicks sweat away, keeping you cool and dry throughout your workout.
